alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie County; South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 02 at 3:27AM MST until February 03 at 2:00AM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow continuing. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 2 inches. Total accumulations of 4 to 7 inches. * WHERE...South Laramie Range and Adjacent Foothills, Central Laramie County. This includes Vedauwoo, Horse Creek, and the city of Cheyenne. * WHEN...Until 2 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Dangerous travel conditions due to icy, snow covered roads and reduced visibilities.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie County; South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills
